verses.verse: (Prayer to God in Time of Trouble) Vindicate ((Ps. 26:1; 35:24)) me, O God, And (1 Sam. 24:15; Ps. 35:1) plead my cause against an ungodly nation; Oh, deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man!
For You are the God of my strength; Why do You cast me off? (Ps. 42:9) Why do I go mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
((Ps. 40:11)) Oh, send out Your light and Your truth! Let them lead me; Let them bring me to (Ps. 3:4) Your holy hill And to Your tabernacle.
Then I will go to the altar of God, To God my exceeding joy; And on the harp I will praise You, O God, my God.
(Ps. 42:5, 11) Why are you cast down, O my soul? And why are you disquieted within me? Hope in God; For I shall yet praise Him, The help of my countenance and my God.
